p.codeblock: Future<void> enableExtension( {required String provider, required String extension, bool enable = true, MediaSourceType type = MediaSourceType.unknownMediaSource});
public abstract int EnableExtension(string provider, string extension, bool enable = true, MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE type = MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE.UNKNOWN_MEDIA_SOURCE);

ul.li: To enable multiple extensions, call this method multiple times.
Once this method is called successfully, no other extensions can be loaded.
To enable multiple extensions, call this method multiple times.
After this method is called successfully, no other extensions can be loaded.
To enable multiple extensions, you need to call this method multiple times.
After this method is called successfully, no other extensions can be loaded.
To enable multiple extensions, call this method multiple times.
After this method is successfully called, no other extensions can be loaded.

section.title: Timing
section.p: It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: When this method is called successfully in a channel, the extension enable callback or disable callback is triggered.
When this method is called successfully in a channel, it triggers the callback for enabling or the callback for disabling the extension.
When this method is successfully called in a channel, the extension enabled callback or extension disabled callback is triggered.
When this method is successfully called in a channel, the extension enabled callback or extension disabled callback is triggered.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-3: The extension dynamic library is not loaded. Agora recommends checking whether the library is in the expected location or whether the library name is correct.

< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-3: The extension dynamic library is not loaded. Agora recommends checking whether the library is placed in the expected location or whether the library name is correct.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-3: The extension dynamic library was not loaded. Agora recommends checking whether the library is placed in the expected location or whether the library name is correct.
